approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: To create a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is inefficient and time-consuming.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for V-KYC team leads to access recordings.
The portal should allow users to search recordings by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
Users should be able to upload a file (Excel or text) with a list of LAN IDs to download recordings in bulk.
The system should process the uploaded file and display results in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
The table should have pagination displaying 10 records at a time, and downloads should also be limited to 10 records at a time.
The file upload should accept CSV/TXT files.
Access to the screen should be limited to Team Leaders.

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization for Team Leads and Process Managers.
Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality via file upload (CSV/TXT).
Display of results in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
Pagination for displaying and downloading records (10 at a time).
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal should be restricted to authorized users (Team Leads).
The system should be secure to protect sensitive video recordings.
success_criteria: Easy access to V-KYC recordings for authorized users.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
User acceptance of the new system.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload should accept CSV/TXT files.
Bulk download limited to 50 LAN IDs per file.
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server) is available and accessible.
The necessary APIs for accessing and downloading recordings are available.
Team Leads and Process Managers have the required technical skills to use the portal.
risks: Technical challenges in accessing recordings from the NFS server.
Security risks associated with storing and accessing sensitive video recordings.

recommendations: Include details about the security measures to be implemented.
Specify the performance requirements (e.g., response time for search and download).

recommendations_for_completion: Add a section on security measures.
Define performance requirements (response time, download speed).
